title: Does electricity affect the way we live? - Quora

response.answer_text: Does electricity affect the way we live? Absolutely not. We still churn butter by hand, light our homes with candles, keep our food cold with ice harvested from lakes in the winter, listen only to live performances of music, communicate with distant folks by written letter delivered by hand… For those of us that don't adhere to the Amish traditions, electricity has changed our existence drastically over the last 180 years.

I suggest that you turn off electricity in your house for a week. You will see how your personal life looks like without electricity. There is a saying “Experiment is the mother of knowledge”. Besides, without electricity gas stations wouldn’t work, medical diagnostic equipment wouldn’t work. There would be no Internet to ask such question and much much more.
